Articles.Content: Hi, how do you equip a suit to my kerbal? I saw the icon in the space center toolbar and tried to put a suit on and I typed something in the textbox and pressed "dump" but nothing happened/ How do I use this?  Thanks.Hi, how do you equip a suit to my kerbal?
